title: A Melancholic Astronaut
review: Not The Right Stuff! More of a senseate, cerebic , melodramatic, melancholic movie. Apart from all the overwhelming noise during the opening scenes and the blastoff scenes, I was surprised how well Gosling pulled it off. Seriously sad though

title: A Jennifer Fan must see
review: Coulda been Grace Kelly and Gary Cooper, it's all the same story.

title: If you read the book first , it'll help
review:
The narrative follows the book verbatim, as does most of the dialogue.
The CGI aging trick worked very well. The prison scenes at the end.
I watched Pesci , Keitel and DeNiro in Mean Streets last light as a warmup.

title: A coincident apropos movie to fit the occasion Megexit
review:
As I was reading an article in Counterpunch about Megexit, the author mentioned this movie, so I gave it a go.
The rabbits at the end are a metaphor for something I haven't figured out yet.

title: Mena, Arkansas 1980's
review: Watched this a few months ago, and just finished reading 'Whiteout' Ch.13'The Arkansas Connectiion- Mena' YouTube also has a few clips about Mena.
